column1: Smoque BBQ////I had  the sliced brisket platter with black beans
column3: and fries.  The black beans were OK.  I found the mac & cheese to be fairly ordinary (didn't like the crumb topping
column5: but I can get better fries at Susie's about a mile away.  Cole slaw was underdressed
column6: which I liked.  Cornbread was forgettable.
